description: Xojo projects can be saved in three different formats: Project (text), Binary , and XML. You must have a product license to create the XOJO_XML_PROJECT file. If you do not have a license, you will only be able to save in the binary format.

To create the XOJO_XML_PROJECT file, select File → New Project... , name the application, and click "OK." After you create the project, select File → Save As... , choose the save location, and click Save .
NOTE: REAL Software Real Studio became Xojo, Inc. Xojo in 2013.
